titles.title: 317 Though Dark Be Our Way (Familiar tune - nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Though dark be our way
Since God is our Guide
'Tis ours to obey
'Tis His to provide
Though cisterns be broken
And creatures all fail
The word He hath spoken
Shall surely prevail

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His love in times past
Forbids us to think
He'll leave us at last
In trouble to sink
The Lamb in His glory
Is ever in view
The pledge and the proof
He will help us quite through

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And since all we meet
Must work for our good
The bitter is sweet
The med'cine is food
Though painful at present
'Twill cease before long
And then how triumphant
The conqueror's song
